AuthorInfo.description: Extracts US stock tickers from emails.
AuthorInfo.author: Avi Flambards

Search.Pattern:
(?x) ##### This expression finds full declarations of AMEX tickers. ##### They are of the form 'AMEX:AIM' ##### (\b(?P<exchange>AMEX)(?::\ ?)(?P<ticker>(?M=AMEXTickerType))\b)
##### ##### This expression finds full declarations of NASDAQ tickers. ##### They are of the form 'NASD:MSFT' and 'NASDAQ: MSFT' ##### |(\b(?P<exchange>NYSE)(?::\ ?)(?P<ticker>(?M=NYSETickerType))\b)
##### ##### This expression will find standalone tickers like 'MSFT' if it is ##### unambiguously a ticker and in all caps. ##### |(\b(?P<ticker>(?M=USFilteredTickerType))(?:[\s\)\],])) (?-x)
